text: @parscale @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Vote for us so we can kill you! Here’s a mask you don’t need for all that fake COVID19 that hasn’t really killed ten of thousands of Americans. Y’all get back to work & send us your money before you die! Woohoo! Partayyyyyyy.
